description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Rotate blocks to for squares and gain points.  Build larger groups and cause chain reactions.  But watch out for the creeping Toxic waste!  Allow the screen to fill with Toxic squares and you lose!
